doc.field: All material re: fire prevention inspections/procedures. Notice of Violation (NOV) Manual (1991). AFID Building Inspection Forms-Curriculum, Instructors Manual (2005), Spadafora identified in acknowledgements as Assistant Chief of Training in the Bureau of Training/Office of Fire & Life Safety. Field Activity Report manual (2002), includes forms, codes, procedures, and related. Manual for inspecting places of worship/religious structures. Copies of Powerpoint slides re: Regulatory Reform (Fire safety) Order 2004, with attached memo re: fire door requirements of April 2006. Outlines of instructions for completing various inspection forms. Booklet of blank "Vacate" forms (Violation Order Book), with Do Not Enter stickers in English and Spanish (1988). Binder of photocopies of various FDNY forms. "Manual for Fire Protection" booklet issued by the Division of Training (1964). NYC Fire Prevention Code, Chapt 19, with heavily annotated training course (fire tech/fire promotion) material, circa 1974-1980, with some mid-80s. Copy of NYC Reference Standard (RS) 19 re: safety of public and property during construction operations, 1990s. Binder of copies of slides: "AFID-Battalion Chief Response, Fire & Life Safety", 2002, with overviews of requirements etc re: pyrotechnics, vacate situations, construction, etc. (See also box 9548)
